page.title: 10ATTITUDE/INDUSTRY/LANDSCAPE
page.content: CHEMICALS. I think that the S.C.M. chemical works in Immingham is very ugly and dirty even though people still work there. Some of the buildings are new but most of them are old. There are lots of chimneys out of which comes polluting smoke. There are a lot of waste chemicals which are burnt and that is how we get polluted air. The buildings look horrid; some are low but most are high, at least 50 metres. There are lots of pipes but not many windows; part of it looks like a giant vacuum cleaner. There are lots of fences, sheds, warehouses and oil tanks with lots of traffic making it oily, smelly and noisy. (B. Grey) (O.S. Ref. TA 216147)
